roleset.name: make into a code, encrypt

example.name: code-v: topic detection
example.text: Pinpoint Information Corp., Chantilly, Va., a producer of $1,800-a-year personalized newsletters about the computer industry that started full operation last month, relies on 12 human readers [*]to code news releases by topic in order to select items for each subscriber.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Pinpoint Information Corp. , Chantilly , Va. , a producer of $ 1,800 - a - year personalized newsletters about the computer industry that started full operation last month , relies on 12 human readers to code news releases by topic in order to select items for each subscriber .

example.name: code-v: Arg0, 1
example.text: Their coding of secret orders allowed them to infiltrate the enemy camp.

roleset.note: CODE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'code' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from code.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: write software, writing computer programs

example.name: ARG1
example.text: Once all the articles are coded and put in a data base , Pinpoint 's computers pick the most relevant for each subscriber and lay them out in a three - to - five - page newsletter format ; each newsletter is sent directly from the computer to the subscriber 's fax machine .

example.name: code-v: Arg0, 1
example.text: Her coding of the Javascript program was fueled by massive amount of iced coffee.

roleset.note: CODE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'code' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from code.02-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: be encoded for a certain function, as with genes

example.name: code-v
example.text: The Gene The modern working definition of a gene is a portion -LRB- or sequence -RRB- of DNA that codes for a known cellular function or process -LRB- e.g. the function `` make melanin molecules '' -RRB- .
example.arg: for a known cellular function or process -LRB- e.g. the function `` make melanin molecules '' -RRB-

roleset.note: CODE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

roleset.name: medical patient being in cardiac arrest

example.name: coding-n: Arg1
example.text: The patient's coding summoned a team of emergency doctors.

roleset.note: CODING-N NOTES: from clinical notes (from coding.101-n)

role.descr: attribute or attributive state colored as/for

example.name: color_code-v
example.text: Donations color coded orange for pick up.

example.name: color-code-v
example.text: The magnitudes of the coefficients are grouped by observation source and color-coded by region.
